subscription_alternative.monthly_limit: Limits are subject to change and model-specific; as of mid-2024, GPT-4o allows for up to 80 messages every 3 hours on ChatGPT Plus.
5x the usage limits of the free tier, with priority access during high traffic.

pricing_analysis.subscription_adoption_rate: High and growing, driven by consumer products like ChatGPT Plus and Claude Pro which offer access to top-tier models for a flat fee, making advanced AI accessible to a broader audience.
pricing_analysis.trend: The market is experiencing an aggressive price war and rapid increase in cost efficiency. Flagship models are becoming significantly cheaper (e.g., GPT-4o is 50% cheaper than GPT-4 Turbo), while new models like Claude 3.5 Sonnet offer top-tier performance at a lower cost. The $20/month subscription has become the standard for consumer access to premium models. Simultaneously, highly competitive low-cost options from Chinese labs (e.g., DeepSeek, Qwen) and powerful open-source models (Meta's Llama 3) are putting downward pressure on API pricing across the board.
